column2: Yours is a great strength to be measured against, but I daresay I am drawing closer by the day. Would you not agree?
column3: Yours is a great strength to be judged against, but I do believe I'm improving. Would you not agree?

column2: Leave your next foe to me, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>. They will make good sport for my training!
column3: Leave your next foe to me, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>. I could use a good challenge for my training!

column2: These trials seem unending─a true test of my will. I was not expecting such hardship.
column3: These trials are unrelenting─a true test of my resolve. I was not expecting such hardship.

column2: My will would have broken long ago without you at my side. But together, I feel we can stand against any foe!
column3: My resolve would surely have broken long ago were you not at my side. But together, I feel no challenge is too great!

column2: What is that look, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>? Do you fear for my well-being? Worry not! Our battles together have only just begun.
column3: What is that gaze, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>? Do you fear for my safety? You needn't worry so. Our battles together are far from over!

column2: Are you certain this will work? What if I... No, I mustn't think such foolish things. Come, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>, let us seek new foes!
column3: Are you sure this will work? What if I... No, I mustn't doubt myself. Not now. Come, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>, let us seek a new challenge!

column2: Absorbing aether is so much easier now. I feel myself growing stronger with every battle!
column3: Absorbing aether is so much easier now. With every triumph I feel my power increasing!

column2: Am I living up to your expectations? I realize there is much I might yet do to prove myself to you.
column3: I do hope I am meeting your expectations. Though I realize there is much I must yet do to prove myself to you.

column2: The strength you have bestowed upon me is changing somehow... It feels more...focused.
column3: The strength you have lent me is changing somehow... It feels more...focused.

column2: Just a bit more... Yes, I sense that great power is nearly within reach.
column3: Just a little more... Yes, I sense that great power is nearly within my grasp.

column2: This power is unlike anything I've experienced before. So intense, so focused. I... I think I'm ready, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>.
column3: This power is unlike anything I've experienced before. So intense, so focused. I... I think I'm ready, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>.
